tweet.Original_tweet: people say "just be yourself" obviously they don't know me.
tweet.Translate_tweet: people say "just be yourself" obviously they don't know me.

tweet.Original_tweet: i'm so scared. please just hold me.
tweet.Translate_tweet: i'm so scared. please just hold me.

tweet.Original_tweet: i wan things to be back the way they used to be.
tweet.Translate_tweet: i wan things to be back the way they used to be.

tweet.Original_tweet: why did you changed?
tweet.Translate_tweet: why did you changed?

tweet.Original_tweet: i wanna pull the trigger.
tweet.Translate_tweet: i wanna pull the trigger.

tweet.Original_tweet: i don't miss him, i miss who i thought he was.
tweet.Translate_tweet: i don't miss him, i miss who i thought he was.

tweet.Original_tweet: nothing hurts more than realizing he meant everything to you, but you meant nothing to him.
tweet.Translate_tweet: nothing hurts more than realizing he meant everything to you, but you meant nothing to him.

tweet.Original_tweet: a million words would not bring you back, i know because i tried. neither would a million tears, i know because i cried.
tweet.Translate_tweet: a million words would not bring you back, i know because i tried. neither would a million tears, i know because i cried.

tweet.Original_tweet: you hurt me more than i deserve, how can you be so cruel? i love you more than you deserve, why am i such a fool?
tweet.Translate_tweet: you hurt me more than i deserve, how can you be so cruel? i love you more than you deserve, why am i such a fool?

tweet.Original_tweet: while i was holding on, all you did was let go.
tweet.Translate_tweet: while i was holding on, all you did was let go.

tweet.Original_tweet: if you love me so much, why are you walking away?
tweet.Translate_tweet: if you love me so much, why are you walking away?

tweet.Original_tweet: i gave you everything, but it wasn't enough to make you stay.
tweet.Translate_tweet: i gave you everything, but it wasn't enough to make you stay.

tweet.Original_tweet: our sweetest songs are those that tell of the saddest thoughts.
tweet.Translate_tweet: our sweetest songs are those that tell of the saddest thoughts.

tweet.Original_tweet: the hardest thing to do is waking up without you.
tweet.Translate_tweet: the hardest thing to do is waking up without you.

tweet.Original_tweet: we always ignore the ones who adore us, and adore those who ignore us.
tweet.Translate_tweet: we always ignore the ones who adore us, and adore those who ignore us.

tweet.Original_tweet: as soon as forever is through, i'll be over you.
tweet.Translate_tweet: as soon as forever is through, i'll be over you.

tweet.Original_tweet: when my absence doesn't alter your life, then my presence has no meaning in it.
tweet.Translate_tweet: when my absence doesn't alter your life, then my presence has no meaning in it.

tweet.Original_tweet: relationships are like glass. sometimes it's better to leave them broken than try to hurt yourself putting it back together.
tweet.Translate_tweet: relationships are like glass. sometimes it's better to leave them broken than try to hurt yourself putting it back together.

tweet.Original_tweet: i hate being second to those i put first.
tweet.Translate_tweet: i hate being second to those i put first.

tweet.Original_tweet: it hurts to let go, but sometimes it hurts more to hold on.
tweet.Translate_tweet: it hurts to let go, but sometimes it hurts more to hold on.

tweet.Original_tweet: i hate the way that, even though i've moved on, you still sneak into my mind.
tweet.Translate_tweet: i hate the way that, even though i've moved on, you still sneak into my mind.

tweet.Original_tweet: it's hard to take a role in someone's life when you're not even part of the script.
tweet.Translate_tweet: it's hard to take a role in someone's life when you're not even part of the script.

tweet.Original_tweet: the hardest things to let go of are the things you never really had.
tweet.Translate_tweet: the hardest things to let go of are the things you never really had.

tweet.Original_tweet: waiting for you is like waiting for rain in a drought - useless and disappointing.
tweet.Translate_tweet: waiting for you is like waiting for rain in a drought - useless and disappointing.

tweet.Original_tweet: one of the worst things that can happen to a person is to be forgotten by someone they will never forget.
tweet.Translate_tweet: one of the worst things that can happen to a person is to be forgotten by someone they will never forget.

tweet.Original_tweet: i dont know why they call it heartbreak. it feels like every part of my body is broken too.
tweet.Translate_tweet: i dont know why they call it heartbreak. it feels like every part of my body is broken too.

tweet.Original_tweet: the hardest part of dreaming about someone you love is having to wake up.
tweet.Translate_tweet: the hardest part of dreaming about someone you love is having to wake up.

tweet.Original_tweet: clowns wear a face that's painted intentionally on them so they appear to be happy or sad. what kind of mask are you wearing today?
tweet.Translate_tweet: clowns wear a face that's painted intentionally on them so they appear to be happy or sad. what kind of mask are you wearing today?

tweet.Original_tweet: usually when people are sad, they don't do anything. they just cry over their condition. but when they get angry, they bring about a change.
tweet.Translate_tweet: usually when people are sad, they don't do anything. they just cry over their condition. but when they get angry, they bring about a change.

tweet.Original_tweet: better never to have met you in my dream than to wake and reach for hands that are not there.
tweet.Translate_tweet: better never to have met you in my dream than to wake and reach for hands that are not there.

tweet.Original_tweet: ever has it been that love knows not its own depth until the hour of separation.
tweet.Translate_tweet: ever has it been that love knows not its own depth until the hour of separation.

tweet.Original_tweet: i miss you more than words can say
tweet.Translate_tweet: i miss you more than words can say

tweet.Original_tweet: i wish i could be good enough.
tweet.Translate_tweet: i wish i could be good enough.

tweet.Original_tweet: i have a eating disorder, but no one would ever notice that i need help. who would believe the fat kid anyway?
tweet.Translate_tweet: i have a eating disorder, but no one would ever notice that i need help. who would believe the fat kid anyway?

tweet.Original_tweet: it's been so long. we've seen other people. but i still cry when i think of us. i guess letting go is harder than i thought.
tweet.Translate_tweet: it's been so long. we've seen other people. but i still cry when i think of us. i guess letting go is harder than i thought.

tweet.Original_tweet: sometimes all i see is the pain in your eyes
tweet.Translate_tweet: sometimes all i see is the pain in your eyes

tweet.Original_tweet: i lie awake missing your arms, wishing i was in them
tweet.Translate_tweet: i lie awake missing your arms, wishing i was in them

tweet.Original_tweet: why do i feel so alone?
tweet.Translate_tweet: why do i feel so alone?

tweet.Original_tweet: why is your ego and pride more important than your love for me?
tweet.Translate_tweet: why is your ego and pride more important than your love for me?

tweet.Original_tweet: you let me stay in my misery
tweet.Translate_tweet: you let me stay in my misery

tweet.Original_tweet: no you wouldn't. you would just let me cry
tweet.Translate_tweet: no you wouldn't. you would just let me cry

tweet.Original_tweet: you don't care. you don't care at all.
tweet.Translate_tweet: you don't care. you don't care at all.

tweet.Original_tweet: i hate this world.
tweet.Translate_tweet: i hate this world.

tweet.Original_tweet: why are you so mean?
tweet.Translate_tweet: why are you so mean?

tweet.Original_tweet: best friends is just another word for betrayal
tweet.Translate_tweet: best friends is just another word for betrayal

tweet.Original_tweet: fake people. fake world. i hate the world
tweet.Translate_tweet: fake people. fake world. i hate the world

tweet.Original_tweet: sometimes surviving is the worst kind of pain.
tweet.Translate_tweet: sometimes surviving is the worst kind of pain.

tweet.Original_tweet: today is a bad day
tweet.Translate_tweet: today is a bad day

tweet.Original_tweet: i'm so sorry, i've been awful
tweet.Translate_tweet: i'm so sorry, i've been awful

tweet.Original_tweet: i hate you, you're so rude!
tweet.Translate_tweet: i hate you, you're so rude!
